name: Banishing Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 force damage and must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished to a harmless demiplane until the end of its next turn.

name: Beguiling Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you until the end of its next turn.

name: Bursting Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 force damage. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 force damage.

name: Enfeebling Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 necrotic damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or deal half damage with weapon attacks until the end of its next turn.

name: Grasping Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 poison damage. Poisonous vines reduce the targetâ€™s speed by 10 feet, and it takes 2d6 slashing damage the first time it moves on each turn.

name: Piercing Arrow
description: You fire an arrow that pierces through creatures. Make an attack roll against each creature in a line; each creature hit takes an extra 2d6 piercing damage.

name: Seeking Arrow
description: You make the attack roll with advantage, ignoring half and three-quarters cover. On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 force damage, and the arrow curves toward the target even if it is hidden.

name: Shadow Arrow
description: On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
